job description:
Overview

Design and architect machine learning (ML) workflows to inform CRM and Loyalty programs. Be responsible for end-to-end implementation of ML models in cloud.

Responsibilities

Work with product managers to understand the business objectives Work closely with data engineers to ensure the source data is aggregated and cleansed Design and development of machine learning models Articulate models to senior leaders in the organization Mentor junior data scientists

Qualifications
  • Education: Masters
  • Experience: 12, DataScience; Software Engineering.
  • Statistics and Math.
  • Data Science.
  • Software Engineering.
  • Public Cloud
Internal Posting Dates: 8/28 - 9/11
